title: Episode 494 - DB Sports Companion Show 10/22/19 - 2019 NBA Preview

itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Zion Williamson's bust potential, why this NFL season has been miserable for betting, why Joe Burrow is the Heisman favorite, if Urban Meyer would actually entertain coaching the Dallas Cowboys, this week's College...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Zion Williamson's bust potential, why this NFL season has been miserable for betting, why Joe Burrow is the Heisman favorite, if Urban Meyer would actually entertain coaching the Dallas Cowboys, this week's College Football and NFL spreads, and lastly we break down every team in the NBA including our "Way Too Early Predictions" for who wins the Championship.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss Zion Williamson's bust potential, why this NFL season has been miserable for betting, why Joe Burrow is the Heisman favorite, if Urban Meyer would actually entertain coaching the Dallas Cowboys, this week's College Football and NFL spreads, and lastly we break down every team in the NBA including our "Way Too Early Predictions" for who wins the Championship.
